https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9Dv5EG4cu5NFXMQ3u7nuAVlrivM.jpg Matt, a 19-year-old student, goes to the hospital to see his newborn son. He learns his girlfriend plans to put the baby up for adoption without his consent, so he takes his son to his grandmother's house to fight for custody. A Dad for Christmas
